page.title: 05SEALE HAYNE COLLEGE (CONTD).
page.content: e.g.effective use of energy in milk production.The college farm is an excellent teaching aid,providing data for research projects and an opportunity to observe production and management techniques at first hand.Job opportunities,after training, are good(unusual for 1985).Most go on to manage farms and estates,or find employment in industries relating to agriculture e.g.food processing.Some join advisory services.One ex student has taken full advantage of the{Seale {Hayne}qualification and reputation.He has worked on farming projects in varying capacities with major international companies in Kenya,Libya ,Somalia and Mozambique,and is now a project development agronomist in South Africa.The college motto is "IN CALEO SALVS".Roughly interpreted, "Its a healthy life in the open air".
